title: Florin Curta is professor of Medieval History and Archaeology at the University of Florida. His books include The Making of the Slavs: History and Archaeology of the Lower Danube Region, ca. 500–700
which received the Herbert Baxter Adams Award of the American Historical Association, and Southeastern Europe in the Middle Ages, 500–1250
